title: [FR] Allow to view more columns for params and metrics
body:
### Willingness to contribute

No. I cannot contribute this feature at this time.

### Proposal Summary

Currently, mlflow displays only up to 3 columns for parameters and up to 3 columns for metrics, which is extremely limiting.
Viewing multiple columns for both params and metrics would have been so much more useful
![2022-05-18 - Copy](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29167311/169033072-7ad405c4-c250-4691-82ef-4f8f82c326e7.png)
.

### Motivation

#### What is the use case for this feature?
There are many more than 3 distinguishing features for runs to be compared and more than 3 metrics to evaluate them by

#### Why is this use case valuable to support for MLflow users in general?

#### Why is this use case valuable to support for your project(s) or organization?

#### Why is it currently difficult to achieve this use case?
The 'Compare' functionality is too clunky for this and works slowly, besides, params and features are shown separately there

### Details

_No response_
